concept.title: cards element
concept.shortdesc: cards element is a container of multiple Token Cards

conbody.p: A cards element contains definitions for Token Cards. It can be used as a root element of a TokenScript File.

p.codeblock: <ts:cards> <ts:card type="action" name="convert-to-xdAI"> ... </ts:card> <ts:card type="token" name="main"> ... </ts:card> <ts:card type="activity" name="OwnerApproved"> ... </ts:card> </ts:cards>
